Car Herder

A game where you shepard the shee.. uh, I mean, cars, to your own part of the stage!

Game and Rules

Up to four players can play this local multiplayer car game where you have to win to score points by having cars in your part of the arena. The cars are all terrified of you and will try to run away from you while keeping to their pack; much like sheep running from a shepards dog.

Development Process

The game was made for a local game jam with the theme of "nurturing" in a team of 5 people. We collectively designed the game while I was responsible for programming the flock-behavior of the sheep, I mean cars.

  • Date:
    5/08/18
  • Engine:
    Unity
  • Role on team:
    Programmer and designer
  • Team size:
    Five people
  • Time given:
    48 hours
